name: Pachinko Tarot
description:
PACHINKO TAROT

Where a ball grants you a fortune!

A silly game I made while studying programming on the Unity Junior Programmer pathway. Launch a ball, and depending on where it falls, you'll be granted a fortune, that is 100% not useless!

CONTROLS:
  • A/D to move the ball
  • Spacebar to release
  • Use the restart button to try again!

If the ball gets stuck, give it one second and it should release itself!

If you find any bugs let me know in the comments (or send me a message if you know me irl) and I will do my best to fix them!
